name: VISION TEST
title: Assess Your Vision Health
instructions: Answer the following questions based on your vision health symptoms. Score: 1 = Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Frequently, 4 = Often, 5 = Always. Total score at the end of each section will let you know your vision health risks and suggested recommendations immediately.

sections.name: vision-health
sections.title: Vision Problems & Eye Health
sections.description: Tobacco use increases the risk of cataracts, macular degeneration, and optic nerve damage.

questions.question: Do you experience blurry vision or difficulty seeing at night?
Have your eyes been more sensitive to light recently?
Do you often have dry, red, or itchy eyes?
Have you been diagnosed with glaucoma, cataracts, or retinal damage?
